author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Czech Government Survives No-Confidence Vote Over $45M Bitcoin Donation
description: Lawmakers rejected an attempt to oust Prime Minister Fiala after a controversial $45M bitcoin donation to the state was accepted.
content:
The Czech government has weathered a political storm this week, surviving a no-confidence vote triggered by a $45 million bitcoin payment from a convicted criminal.
The scandal has rocked Prime Mini… [+1536 chars]
